thread.title: Irony alert! James Jordan is now showing Peter Andre favouritism on Strictly Come Dancing - Strictly Come Dancing Reality TV
thread.title_full: Irony alert! James Jordan is now showing Peter Andre favouritism on Strictly Come Dancing - Strictly Come Dancing News - Reality TV - Digital Spy

author: Ian Sandwell
title: Irony alert! James Jordan is now showing Peter Andre favouritism on Strictly Come Dancing - Strictly Come Dancing Reality TV
text: James Jordan has a surprising favourite in this year's Strictly Come Dancing.The dancer wants Peter Andre to win the show, despite recently claiming show bosses were giving Andre an unfair advantage. © BBC / Guy LevyPeter Andre and Janette Manrara When asked on Twitter whether it annoyed him that Andre always seems to perform near the end, Jordan gave his support for the singer."I want him to win so no," Jordan wrote. "But it's because producers know people really want to see him so will stay tuned."I want him to win so no... But it's because producers know people really want to see him so will stay tuned. https://t.co/BqR3MbObjp— James Jordan (@The_JamesJordan) October 17, 2015Last night, Jordan had some criticism for Andre but exclaimed that it was the "best PERFORMANCE of the night".He added that the musician's intensity was "one of the best" he'd ever seen on the show.PeterHe still needs to drive much more around the floor. Pivots a bit small too.But best PERFORMANCE of the night— James Jordan (@The_JamesJordan) October 17, 2015PeterHis intensity is one of the best I have EVER seen on strictly..Great job guys! Nice routine Janette In hold however could be better— James Jordan (@The_JamesJordan) October 17, 2015After Jordan's original favouritism claims, Andre told Digital Spy that he got in touch with the dancer."I tweeted James today because I don't take it personally at all," he explained. "I want him to know that I'm trying my best. I don't take it personally at all and I love James."Strictly Come Dancing continues tonight (October 18) at 7.15pm on BBC One.
